mapper.select: SELECT G.id AS gachaId , G.status , G.title , G.manufacturer , G.file_id , F.file_url , G.price , G.view_count , G.created_at FROM GACHA G LEFT JOIN IMAGE_FILE F ON F.file_id = G.file_id WHERE G.id = #{gachaId}
SELECT id AS gachaItemId , name FROM GACHA_ITEM WHERE gacha_id = #{gachaId} ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE GACHA SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{gachaId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GACHA_WISH WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND gacha_id = #{gachaId}
